name: Creditlink
overview:
At Creditlink, we specialize in arranging secured loans and bridging finance. We aim to take the complicated terms and difficult procedures out of the picture - providing you with clear, uncomplicated advice and services.

We pride ourselves on our problem solving capabilities – we know that life can be tough some times and that ultimately money is sometimes the only solution. However, we’re not just another loan company. We fervently believe that every case is different and so we work towards a solution rather than just trying to force our customers into a particular box.

We’ll learn as much as we can about your situation and use that information to provide you with the most helpful and useful service we can.

Give Creditlink a call today: we’re more than happy to have a chat and hopefully work with you in creating a solution.
